hero.title: ConnectED – The PhD Journey, Connected
hero.description: ConnectED brings clarity, structure, and opportunity to the PhD lifecycle. Whether you're starting your research journey or supporting those who are, we're here to help.

mission.heading: One connected ecosystem for the entire research journey
mission.paragraph1: ConnectED brings students, researchers, supervisors, and institutions into one connected ecosystem. Students gain clarity. Universities gain efficiency. Supervisors gain insight. Employers gain visibility.
mission.paragraph2: We understand that the PhD journey can feel overwhelming, fragmented, and uncertain. That's why we've built a platform that provides structure without rigidity, support without dependency, and clarity without oversimplification.

cta.heading: Ready to transform your research journey?
cta.description: ConnectED brings students, researchers, supervisors, and institutions into one connected ecosystem. Students gain clarity. Universities gain efficiency. Supervisors gain insight. Employers gain visibility.

hero.title: Navigate your research journey with clarity
hero.description: ConnectED is your companion throughout the entire PhD lifecycle. From finding the right supervisor to planning your career after graduation, we provide the structure and support you need to thrive.

painPoints.heading: We understand the struggles you face
items: Unclear expectations and uncertain milestones throughout the PhD journey
Scattered funding opportunities that are difficult to find and navigate
Limited guidance on structuring research and developing proposals
Difficulty finding the right supervisor with aligned research interests
Uncertainty about career paths after completing a doctorate
Feeling isolated without access to networks and mentorship

entryPaths.title: Entry Paths
entryPaths.description: Supervisor matching, proposal guidance, application roadmap, and progress tracking. We help you start your PhD journey on the right foot with clear direction and expert support.
entryPaths.heading: Start your journey with confidence

items.title: Supervisor Matching
items.description: Find supervisors whose research interests align with yours through intelligent matching.

items.title: Proposal Guidance
items.description: Structure your research proposal with expert templates and feedback.

items.title: Application Roadmap
items.description: Navigate the application process with clear milestones and deadlines.

items.title: Progress Tracking
items.description: Monitor your progress and stay accountable with structured milestones.

exitPaths.title: Exit Paths
exitPaths.description: Career mapping, skills translation, curated roles and fellowships, plus mentoring and networks. We prepare you for life after your PhD with actionable pathways forward.
exitPaths.heading: Prepare for life after your PhD

items.title: Career Mapping
items.description: Explore diverse career paths tailored to your skills and interests.

items.title: Skills Translation
items.description: Learn how to articulate your research skills for industry and beyond.

items.title: Curated Opportunities
items.description: Access curated roles and fellowships matched to your profile.

items.title: Mentoring & Networks
items.description: Connect with mentors and expand your professional network.

researcherPassport.title: Researcher Passport
researcherPassport.description: Your verified academic identity with training records, skills, outputs, and collaborations. Portable across institutions, it follows you throughout your entire academic career.
researcherPassport.heading: Your verified academic identity, wherever you go
researcherPassport.subheading: The Researcher Passport is your portable academic profile that follows you throughout your career. It captures your verified credentials, training, skills, outputs, and collaborations in one secure place.

cta.heading: Build your pathway with clarity
cta.description: Join thousands of researchers who have found structure and support with ConnectED. Start your journey today.

hero.title: Efficiency and quality for your institution
hero.description: ConnectED helps universities and research partners streamline doctoral programmes, improve supervision workflows, and achieve better outcomes for researchers and institutions alike.

painPoints.heading: We understand the pressures you face
items: Heavy administrative load across the research lifecycle
Poor alignment between applicant capabilities and supervisor capacity
Low visibility into researcher development and progress
Inefficient supervision workflows with limited standardisation
Increasing pressure to support diverse career outcomes
Fragmented systems that don't communicate with each other

ctaCard.heading: Ready to transform your doctoral programme?
ctaCard.description: Join leading universities who are improving efficiency and outcomes with ConnectED.

features.title: Better Aligned Applicants
features.description: AI-supported matching ensures applicants are paired with the right supervisors. Improved proposal quality means better-prepared candidates from day one.

features.title: Efficient Supervisor Workflows
features.description: Standardised profiles and readiness indicators help supervisors manage their time effectively. Clear expectations reduce friction and improve outcomes.

features.title: Reduced Administrative Burden
features.description: The portable Researcher Passport eliminates repeated checks and paperwork. Verified credentials follow researchers, saving time across the institution.

features.title: Insight into Researcher Development
features.description: Track skills progression and confidence indicators throughout the PhD journey. Data-driven insights help identify and support researchers who need extra guidance.

features.title: Improved Institutional Outcomes
features.description: Higher completion rates and stronger alumni trajectories reflect well on your institution. ConnectED helps you achieve the outcomes that matter most.

betterMatching.heading: AI-powered applicant-supervisor matching
betterMatching.description: Our intelligent matching system analyses research interests, methodological approaches, and supervisor capacity to create optimal pairings. This leads to better-prepared applicants and more productive supervisory relationships.

dataInsights.heading: Visibility into researcher development
dataInsights.description: ConnectED provides comprehensive insights into researcher progress, skills development, and confidence indicators. Identify researchers who may need additional support early, and track outcomes across your doctoral programme.

cta.heading: Explore partnership opportunities with ConnectED
cta.description: Join leading institutions who are transforming their doctoral programmes. Let's discuss how ConnectED can support your strategic goals.

hero.title: About ConnectED
hero.description: We believe the PhD journey shouldn't feel isolating, unclear, or overwhelming. ConnectED exists to bring structure, support, and connection to researchers and institutions alike.

mission.heading: Transforming the research journey
mission.paragraph1: ConnectED was founded on the understanding that the PhD lifecycle is complex, often fragmented, and rarely supported by cohesive infrastructure.
mission.paragraph2: Our mission is to bring clarity to researchers, efficiency to institutions, and connection across the entire ecosystem. We believe that when students, supervisors, universities, and employers work together, everyone benefits.

vision.heading: A connected future
vision.paragraph1: We envision a future where every researcher has a clear pathway from application to career, where institutions can support their doctoral programmes efficiently, and where the value of research is visible to society.
vision.paragraph2: ConnectED is building the infrastructure to make this vision a reality, one connection at a time.

items.title: Human-Centred
items.description: We design for real people with real challenges. Every feature starts with understanding the human experience.

items.title: Clarity
items.description: We bring structure to complexity without oversimplifying. Clear pathways, clear expectations, clear outcomes.

items.title: Connection
items.description: We build bridges between students, supervisors, institutions, and employers. Together, we achieve more.

cta.heading: Join the ConnectED community
cta.description: Whether you're a researcher starting your journey or an institution looking to improve outcomes, we're here to help.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.description: Whether you're a student seeking clarity, a researcher looking for support, or an institution exploring partnership, we'd love to hear from you.

contactInfo.office:
Innovation Hub, Research Park
Cambridge, UK

formSection.heading: Let's connect
formSection.description: Fill out the form and our team will get back to you within 48 hours. You can also reach us directly through the channels below.

sections.formDescription: Fill out the form and our team will get back to you within 48 hours. You can also reach us directly through the channels below.

formSuccess.heading: Thank you for reaching out!
formSuccess.message: We've received your message and will get back to you within 48 hours.

items.question: Is ConnectED free for students?
items.answer: ConnectED offers free core features for students and researchers. Some advanced features may be available through institutional partnerships.

items.question: How do university partnerships work?
items.answer: We work with institutions to integrate ConnectED into existing doctoral programmes. Contact us to discuss partnership models tailored to your needs.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We take data security seriously and comply with GDPR and institutional data protection requirements. Your Researcher Passport remains under your control.

footer.description: Bringing clarity, structure, and opportunity to the PhD lifecycle. Connecting students, researchers, supervisors, and institutions.
